title: Create e-commerce fashion store with fullscreen homepage carousel

requirements.text: Create a product catalog system in the backend that stores fashion items with fields for name, description, price, sizes, colors, and image URLs
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores product data with all required fields
Products can be retrieved via query methods
Product data persists across canister upgrades

requirements.text: Create a shopping cart system in the backend that allows adding items, updating quantities, and calculating totals
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add products to cart with selected size and color
Cart quantities can be updated or items removed
Cart total is calculated correctly including all items

requirements.text: Build a fullscreen slideshow carousel component for the homepage that displays hero images with smooth transitions
acceptanceCriteria: Carousel takes up full viewport height
Slides transition smoothly with navigation controls
Carousel is responsive and works on all screen sizes

requirements.text: Create a product listing page that displays all available fashion items in a grid layout with images, names, and prices
acceptanceCriteria: Products are displayed in a responsive grid
Each product shows image, name, and price
Users can click products to view details

requirements.text: Create a product detail page that shows full product information including description, available sizes, colors, and add-to-cart functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Product details are displayed clearly
Users can select size and color options
Add to cart button adds selected item to shopping cart

requirements.text: Build a shopping cart page that displays cart items with quantities, allows quantity updates and item removal, and shows the total price
acceptanceCriteria: All cart items are displayed with details
Quantities can be adjusted inline
Total price updates automatically
Items can be removed from cart

requirements.text: Implement a creative and vanguardist design aesthetic throughout the site with the brand color #a932bd as the primary accent color, featuring bold typography, modern layouts, and artistic visual elements that celebrate transwomen fashion

quotes: with the most creative and vanguardist designs, colors #a932bd

acceptanceCriteria: Primary brand color #a932bd is used consistently for key UI elements
Design features bold, artistic typography and modern layouts
Visual aesthetic is cohesive and celebrates the target audience
Design feels cutting-edge and fashion-forward

constraints: Use #a932bd as the primary brand color throughout the design
Fullscreen carousel must be the first element on the homepage
nonGoals: User account creation or authentication beyond Internet Identity
